response.original_title: John Carter: 100 Years in the Making
response.overview: This featurette examines Edgar Rice Burroughs' life, the genesis and success of the original "John Carter" series, the many attempts filmmakers from almost every era made to bring his stories to the silver screen, and the eventual adaptation that finally made it into theaters some one-hundred years later.
response.title: John Carter: 100 Years in the Making
